altTitles.ja: 霊媒師いずな 特別編

description.en:
From 2007 to 2016, it includes unpublished episodes and color illustrations of the "Reichuushi Izuna" series, which was serialized in Shueisha's Super Jump and Grand Jump special editions.
All 10 volumes of ``Izuna the Spiritualist'' and 10 volumes of the ``Izuna the Spiritualist Ascension'' are on sale from Shueisha in paper and electronic form. (The electronic version can be purchased on Shueisha's website.)

"Part 1 Her Izuna VS Yuki Onna"
Published in the December special issue of Grand Jump 2016. Nube, Tamamo, and Yukime appear as guests from the "Hell Teacher Nube" series. However, since it is published in a youth magazine, the depiction of sexual appeal is quite strong (bitter smile).

"Part 2 Hell Pants Again!
" The depiction of sex appeal is more intense than last time, so be prepared and read! Also, Nube, Tamamo, and Nemuri will appear as guests from the "Hell Teacher Nube" series. However, since this is a one-shot of the "Izuna" series, those who don't know the "Izuna" series may not be able to understand the characters.

"Part 3 Hanami no Utage"
was published in the 2018 Grand Jump April special issue. There will be no guest appearances from "Hell Teacher Nube" this time. It is a pure "Izuna" story. Originally, it was planned to lead to the third part of the "Izuna" series from here... but due to various circumstances, it has not been realized yet.
